topic.title: How does ZeroName work?
topic.body: As far as I know is based on the meta info contained in the Bitcoin blockchain so my question would be if Is it required to make a bitcoin purchase for that?

1_1GFA9WKyB9QKCcWWyD3Zkcs7E1HonYwLLE.body: Silly me, there is some info at the bottom. Now I see is based on namecoin infrastructure,
